attributes.action: help all people to rent accommadation without being messed about by estate agents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: good credit checks approved. great refrances from ex landlords approved. great job referrance approved and to top it up, a company willing to put half a million down as a garantor on behalf of some one who had all this to give to letsure estate agents, to be told its not good enougth. is this fair?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
